verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> Vai-yish-lach sent; חִירָם chi-ram כחוּרָ֨ם <WH2438> chu-Ram Hiram קמֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king צֹ֥ר <WH6865> tzor of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִיד֒ <WH1732> da-Vid to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> va-'a-Tzei and timber אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim, of cedars וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <WH2796> ve-cha-ra-Shei and carpenters קִ֔יר <WH7023> Kir, with masons וְחָרָשֵׁ֖י <WH2796> ve-cha-ra-Shei artificer עֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> 'e-Tzim; trees לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> liv-Not to build ל֖וֹ lo בָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> Ba-yit. him an house

וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> vai-Ye-da' perceived דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, And David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <WH3559> he-chi-No had confirmed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech him king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִשֵּׂ֤את <WH5375> nis-Set was lifted up לְמַ֙עְלָה֙ <WH4605> le-Ma'-lah on high מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> mal-chu-To, for his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> ba-'a-Vur the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo because of his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> da-Vid And David ע֛וֹד <WH5750> od more נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> na-Shim more wives בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; at Jerusalem וַיּ֧וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led begat דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> da-Vid and David ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od of more בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> ba-Nim more sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> u-va-Not. and daughters

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot Now these [are] the names הַיְלוּדִ֔ים <WH3205> hay-lu-Dim, of [his] children אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after הָיוּ־ <WH1961> ha-yu- become ל֖וֹ lo בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; which he had in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <WH8051> sham-Mu-a' Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <WH7727> ve-sho-Vav, and Shobab נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> na-Tan Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> u-she-lo-Moh. and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <WH2984> ve-yiv-Char And Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <WH474> ve-'e-li-Shu-a' and Elishua וְאֶלְפָּֽלֶט׃ <WH467> ve-'el-Pa-let. and Elpalet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <WH5052> ve-No-gah And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <WH5298> ve-Ne-feg and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> ve-ya-Fi-a'. and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <WH476> ve-'e-li-sha-Ma' And Elishama וּבְעֶלְיָדָ֖ע <WH1182> u-ve-'el-ya-Da' and Beeliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <WH467> ve-'e-li-Fa-let. and Eliphalet

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, And when the Philistines כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִמְשַׁ֨ח <WH4886> nim-Shach was anointed דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> da-Vid that David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> le-Me-lech king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, over all Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu went up כָל־ <WH3605> chol all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> le-vak-Kesh to seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> da-Vid; David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, And David וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze [of it] and went out לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. against

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u; came וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <WH6584> vai-yif-she-Tu and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> be-'E-mek themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> re-fa-'Im. of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> vai-yish-'Al enquired דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> da-Vid And David בֵּאלֹהִים֙ <WH430> be-lo-Him of God לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <WH5927> ha-'e-'e-Leh Shall I go up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against; פְּלִשְׁתִּיִּים pe-lish-ti-yim כפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, Philistine קוּנְתַתָּ֖ם <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tam for I will deliver בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> be-ya-Di; them into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said ל֤וֹ lo יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh, unto him Go up וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tim will give בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha. your hand

וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu So they came up בְּבַֽעַל־ be-va-'al- פְּרָצִים֮ <WH1188> pe-ra-Tzim to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <WH5221> vai-yak-Kem smote שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham there דָּוִיד֒ <WH1732> da-Vid and David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, them there Then David פָּרַ֨ץ <WH6555> pa-Ratz hath broken in הָֽאֱלֹהִ֧ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אוֹיְבַ֛י <WH341> 'oy-Vai upon mine enemies בְּיָדִ֖י <WH3027> be-ya-Di by mine hand כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6556> ke-Fe-retz like the breaking forth מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; of waters עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> Ken, after that קָֽרְא֛וּ <WH7121> ka-re-'U therefore they called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al פְּרָצִֽים׃ <WH1188> pe-ra-Tzim. Baalperazim

וַיַּעַזְבוּ־ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-vu- And when they had left שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their gods וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer gave a commandment דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, there David וַיִּשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> vai-yis-sa-re-Fu and they were burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ba-'Esh. with fire פ Peh

וַיֹּסִ֤יפוּ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu yet again עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od yet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <WH6584> vai-yif-she-Tu spread themselves abroad בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> ba-'E-mek. in the valley

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> vai-yish-'Al enquired ע֤וֹד <WH5750> od again דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid Therefore David בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> be-lo-Him, again of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, and God לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תַֽעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> ta-'a-Leh unto him Go not up אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after הָסֵב֙ <WH5437> ha-Sev them turn away מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> me-'a-lei-Hem, and וּבָ֥אתָ <WH935> u-Va-ta from them and come לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> la-Hem in מִמּ֥וּל <WH4136> mi-Mul upon them over against הַבְּכָאִֽים׃ <WH1057> hab-be-cha-'Im. the mulberry trees

וִ֠יהִי <WH1961> Vi-hi become כְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֞ <WH8085> ke-sha-me-'a-Cha And it shall be when thou shalt hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol a sound הַצְּעָדָה֙ <WH6807> hatz-tze-'a-Dah of going בְּרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> be-ra-Shei in the tops הַבְּכָאִ֔ים <WH1057> hab-be-cha-'Im, of the mulberry trees אָ֖ז <WH227> 'az then תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> te-Tze [that] then thou shalt go out בַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> vam-mil-cha-Mah; to battle כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָצָ֤א <WH3318> ya-Tza is gone forth הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him for God לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, before לְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> le-hak-Kot thee to smite אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as therefore did דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, David כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> tziv-Va-hu commanded הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; as God וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku him and they smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines מִגִּבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> mig-giv-'on from Gibeon וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far גָּֽזְרָה׃ <WH1507> Ga-ze-rah. even to Gazer

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze went out שֵׁם־ <WH8034> shem- And the fame דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָֽאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot; into all lands וַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פַּחְדּ֖וֹ <WH6343> pach-Do the fear עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim. of him upon all nations
